properties: Made by the well-respected and renowned athletic garments company Ebbets Field Flannels. Hand-sewn from genuine wool baseball cloth. This cap is built to last a lifetime.
Made in the USA
Genuine wool broadcloth, white felt "Coursework C" icon  with combined embroidery
Soft visor with green satin under visor
Vintage hair cloth backed buckram crown
Satin taping with cotton sweatband
Black leather strap and black metal press closure
